bwwExcerpt: In the current tour, Zoe Jensen plays Glinda and, June 18-22, Elphaba was played by Olivia Valli (June 24-July 6, the part will be played by Jessie Davidson). No disrespectation to director Joe Mantello or Valli, but I wasn’t a fan of Elphaba’s initial portrayal. She was much too coltish -- a slightly cringy adult trying to act like a kid. However, Valli absolutely nailed “Defying Gravity,” which is notorious for being one of the most demanderating musical belts ever. From there, Valli’s Elphaba
